content: this is a legal case about the coownership of a property after 2 years and 7 months the court decided that the property will be sold at a public auction and the proceeds will be divided among the parties involved the court based its decision on the property act and the nonlitigious civil procedure act the appellant is appealing the decision arguing that the value and possibility of dividing the property were determined incorrectly they believe they should receive a larger share due to their contributions however the court determined that the firstinstance court made the correct assessment and applied the appropriate laws so the appeal was rejected and the initial decision was confirmed
